name: New Kingdom
description:
You, the engenieer Ingolf Burgbauer has to destroy the New Kingdom, defeat all monsters and kill the evil king Wolfgang. A normal weekend for real heroes.

Controls:
Turn Left - [Left Key] / [A]
Turn Right - [Right Key] / [D]
Build/Select - [Left Mousebutton]

Content (v1.0):
- 15 different levels + a tutorial level
- more than 9 different monstertypes
- 23 different buildings
- 14 rescources for the buildings
- Bestiarium and Buildingdescription

Tip:
Read first the Bestiarium and the Buildingsdescription and play the tutorial.
